verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:4
verses.text: And the porch that was in the front of the house, the length of it was according to the breadth of the house, twenty cubits, and the height was an hundred and twenty: and he overlaid it within with pure gold.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:5
verses.text: And the greater house he cieled with fir tree, which he overlaid with fine gold, and set thereon palm trees and chains.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:6
verses.text: And he garnished the house with precious stones for beauty: and the gold was gold of Parvaim.
